usage.title: How to Create Videos with Wan Ai
usage.description: Generate stunning AI videos in three simple steps:

items.title: Choose Your Mode
items.description: Select text-to-video to generate from prompts, or image-to-video to animate your images.

items.title: Input Your Content
items.description: Enter your text description or upload an image that you want to transform into video.

items.title: Generate & Download
items.description: Click generate and watch as Wan 2.6 creates your video. Download and share your creation.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Wan Ai
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us at zyrliuwei@gmail.com

items.question: What is Wan Ai and how does it work?
items.answer: Wan Ai is a one-stop AI video generation platform powered by the latest Wan 2.6 technology. Simply input your text description or upload an image, and our AI will generate a stunning video for you in seconds.

items.question: What video generation modes are supported?
items.answer: Wan Ai supports two main modes: Text to Video, where you describe the video you want in words, and Image to Video, where you upload an image and our AI brings it to life with motion and animation.

items.question: How long does it take to generate a video?
items.answer: Video generation typically takes just a few seconds to a couple of minutes, depending on the length and complexity of your video. Our optimized Wan 2.6 model ensures fast processing without sacrificing quality.

items.question: What is Wan 2.6 technology?
items.answer: Wan 2.6 is our state-of-the-art AI video generation model. It represents the latest breakthrough in AI video synthesis, delivering superior quality, realistic motion, and faster generation speeds.

items.question: Do I need video editing experience to use Wan Ai?
items.answer: Not at all! Wan Ai is designed for everyone, regardless of technical skill level. Our intuitive interface makes it easy for anyone to create professional-quality videos with just a few clicks.

items.question: What can I use the generated videos for?
items.answer: You can use your generated videos for social media content, marketing materials, product showcases, creative projects, educational content, and much more. The possibilities are endless!
